snippet: Tim Kaine, Virginia's newest senator, said he was eager to be a vote for immigration reform that would require those in the country to pay a fine in exchange for permanent legal status.
abstract: Tim Kaine, Virginia's newest senator, said he was eager to be a vote for immigration reform that would require those in the country to pay a fine in exchange for permanent legal status.

headline.main: Kaine Says He Is Optimistic About Immigration Overhaul
